example.text: In this case, President Biden has turned to Venezuela - boosting one of the worst socialist dictatorships in the world, with some of the dirtiest oil in the world. We do not need dirty oil from dictators when we have homegrown, clean energy options available right now.

I'll continue working to hold Communist China accountable and to protect our national security. Bipartisan VA Same Day Scheduling Act We often hear from veterans who struggle to make appointments at the local VA. I'm cosponsoring the VA Same Day Scheduling Act, bipartisan legislation that will make it easier for veterans to schedule appointments at the VA and receive care in a timely manner.

Best, Supporting the NDAA and Ending the Military Vaccine Mandate I proudly supported the bipartisan National Defense Authorization Act this week -- this legislation provides our troops with a pay raise, ensures we have the resources to take on China and Russia, and bolsters our national security. It also rescinds the Biden Administration's COVID-19 vaccine mandate that hurt our military readiness and unfairly punished so many of our brave servicemembers.

[[user]] has passed legislation to cut spending, restore fiscal responsibility, and avoid a default. Does President Biden seriously think there isn’t a single penny in the federal budget that we can cut? Unserious and out of touch with Americans. [[url]]

I hosted a roundtable with Benton County law enforcement to hear about public safety concerns, including the influx of fentanyl coming across the border and the importance of addressing mental health issues. I'll always back the blue & be a strong voice for Iowa law enforcement! [[url]]
